nodes.bodyText: Should the main folder be deleted first? This changes the behaviour ever so slightly

I don’t think so, the main folder is used to resolve the suffixed folders, if the task was interrupted part way through and the main folder was deleted but not the suffixes the suffixes would never get deleted
But it doesn’t really matter much

no longer needed as it's a suffix and will be automatically deleted, test proves it still works https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins/blob/master/test/src/test/java/hudson/model/WorkspaceCleanupThreadTest.java#L181

used here: https://github.com/jenkinsci/workflow-cps-global-lib-plugin/blob/3e5a08f079fc371119fcf1b76a60369724c2eb70/src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/workflow/libs/SCMSourceRetriever.java#L173, would be nice if it's an API so that everything uses the same separator.
Also used here in durable-task and here in workflow-cps (this is where the @script directories come from), and probably a few other places as well.
